title: 开启BSC链的回购并添加lp
body:
目前，oec上采用定期回购并组lp的方式来增加池子深度，而bsc上暂未开启。同时我们能看到bsc上的借贷更为活跃，所以我提议开启bsc链的回购并组lp，增加池子深度，为后续做铺垫。
At present, oec adopts the method of regular repurchase and group lp to increase the depth of the pool, but the bsc has not yet been opened. At the same time, we can see that the lending on the bsc is more active, so I propose to open the repurchase group lp of the bsc chain to increase the depth of the pool and pave the way for the follow-up.
author: 0x873790E6190335F1f9eB970786A94231c0131EB6
